一、1.matter　2.stomachache　3.foot　4.neck　5.stomach

6．throat　7.fever　8.toothache　9.X­ray　10.headache　11.break　12.lie　13.hurt　14.rest　15.cough

4．have a sore throat　5.take one's temperature

6．lie down　7.have a fever　8.get an X­ray

9．take breaks/a break　10.in the same way

3．lie down　4.take my temperature

5．take breaks/a break

1．(1)with you　(2)B

2．(1)后面　(2)has a headache　(3)前面

(4)had a sore throat　(5)cold　(6)fever

(7)cough　(8)hurts

Period 5训练案(Writing)

[思路点拨]

第一步：第一、三人称；一般现在时

第三步：1.not feel well/feel sick　2.have a headache　3.have a sore back　4.have sore eyes　5.do eye exercises　6.lie down　7.have a rest　8.see a doctor

第四步：1.It's bad for our eyes to play computer games.

2．He had better take breaks away from the computer.

[小试牛刀]

参考范文：

It is bad for our body to play computer games for too long.My friend Jimmy likes playing computer games and always sits in the same way without moving, so he has a headache, sore eyes and a sore back now.He can't move his neck and he doesn't have a good sleep at night, either.

I think Jimmy had better take breaks away from the computer first.Next, he should do eye exercises to relax his eyes and lie down to have a rest.Then, he might have to drink more water.Maybe he can drink hot tea with honey.Finally, if he still feels bad，he should go to a doctor.

If Jimmy has a healthy lifestyle, he will feel better soon.

Period 5训练案(Writing)

[思路点拨]

第一步：第一人称；一般现在时、一般将来时

第三步：

1．thank sb.for doing sth.　2.introduce oneself

3．be good at/do well in　4.try one's best to do…

第四步：

It's a good chance for me to help the children and I can do what I love to do at the same time.

[小试牛刀]

参考范文一：

Dear__Sir__or__Madam，

Thanks for spending time reading my letter.I'd like to be a volunteer in your school to help the kids.Now, let me introduce myself.

I am a 14­year­old middle school student.I'm from China.I am going to be a teacher when I grow up.I think it's a good chance for me to help the children and I can do what I love to do at the same time.I'm good at painting and singing.I am outgoing and helpful in my teachers' eyes.So I know how to get on well with kids.What's more, I often help my parents to look after my little brother.So if I'm lucky enough to help out in your school, I can teach the little kids to paint and sing.Moreover, I will come up with some interesting ways to help students to study easily and better.

I love children! I will be very glad if I can be one of the volunteers.

Yours__truly，

Linda

参考范文二：

Dear__Sir__or__Madam，

I'm a student from Class Five, Grade Eight.I know you need new members for your volunteer group and I want to be one of them.

I love kids and I really hope they can feel better with my help.Can I go to your Children's Hospital to be a volunteer this winter vacation? I like reading and I've learnt a lot from it.What's more, I am outgoing and helpful in my teachers' eyes.So I know how to get on well with kids.What's more, I often help my parents to look after my little brother.If I can join you, I will try my best to help the kids and make them happy by telling them funny stories.Moreover, I will come up with some interesting games to play with the sick kids in order to cheer them up.

I think volunteer work is great.And we should always care about people around us.I hope I can be a member of your volunteer group.I'm looking forward to your reply.

Yours__truly，

Linda

[思路点拨]

8．learn to be independent

Many teenagers don't do housework at home.They think there is no need for them to do housework at home.

It's believed that the earlier we start doing chores, the better it is for our future.

I think students should take after­school classes.Here are the reasons.First, if they take after­school classes, they can learn more exam skills so that they can get into a good high school and later a good university.Second, students can take up a new hobby in after­school classes.Some students can even practice sports to improve their physical health.

All in all, it is necessary for students to take after­school classes.

Yours，

Lam

参考范文二：

Dear__sir，

I don't think students should take after­school classes.Here are three reasons.First, students are very busy at school, so they need to relax after school.Second, parents always compare their children with others.I don't think it's fair for children.Third, too many after­school classes can cause a lot of stress for children.

I also take English and physics classes on weekends, but I don't like it because it's a waste of my time.

All in all, I think students should have enough time to relax and think for themselves.

Yours，

Lam

Yu Gong Moves a Mountain

There are many meaningful folk stories in traditional Chinese culture.I'd like to tell you a famous story called Yu Gong Moves a Mountain.

Once upon a time there was an old man named Yu Gong.There were mountains in front of his house and it took him a long time to the other side, so he led his family to try to move the mountains.Two gods were so moved that they helped him move the mountains away.From the story I learn that we'll never know what's possible unless we try to make it happen.

Traditional stories play an important role in Chinese culture.As Chinese, it's our duty to pass on our traditional culture.

Period 5训练案(Writing)

[思路点拨]

第一步：第一、三人称；一般过去时、一般现在时与现在完成时

第三步：1.a poor town　2.live a hard life　3.instead of

4．get better and better　5.tall buildings

6．beautiful sights/scenery/views

7．have a brighter future

第四步：

1．My hometown lies in the south of Guangdong Province.

2．It is a small town with a population of 200 thousand.

[小试牛刀]

参考范文：

Changes in My Hometown

My hometown is called Wushi.It lies in the south of Leizhou, Zhanjiang, Guangdong.It's a coastal town with a population of about 300，000.

Great changes have taken place in my hometown in the past few years.My hometown used to be a poor town, but now people's life is getting much better and richer.People now live in tall and beautiful buildings instead of small one­storey houses.Many tourists come to my hometown to enjoy the beautiful sights and the delicious seafood.

I really love my hometown.I hope my hometown will have a brighter future.

Unit 1单元测试题

二、31～35　CBABB　36～40　CACAC

三、41～45　BADCC　46～50　BBBAC

四、51～55　CABCB　56～60　CBDDA　61～65　EACBF

五、66.others　67.playing　68.angry/mad　69.help　70.what

六、A.回答问题

76．Vitamin C won't stop a cold.

77．They like to stay on the desks.

78．In September and early January.

79．Grandma's chicken soup is a traditional way to beat a cold.

80．What is useful to stop a cold?

B．书面表达

Spring is the peak of the flu.If you have a fever, a headache or a cough, I am afraid you probably have the flu.Having the flu makes you sick, but you can do something to help yourself get better.

First, you should go to a doctor and have a good rest.Second, drinking some chicken soup will help you, too.If you don't want to have the flu easily, you should do more exercise to make yourself strong, and often wash your hands before eating.

I hope all of you can be healthy.

Unit 2单元测试题

二、31～35　CDBCB　36～40　CCBDA

三、41～45　ACBAD　46～50　ACDBC

四、51～55　CBDDD　56～60　CBDDA　61～65　BDFAE

五、66.without　67.themselves　68.a

69．lonely/upset/sad/unhappy　70.If　71.care

六、A.回答问题

76．The word “volunteer”/It usually means one who offers his or her services.

77．They usually help those who are less fortunate than themselves.

78．Tracy/She worked for two and a half weeks in Calcutta.

79．Tracy/She was asked to work in a home for sick people.

80．Tracy/She learned about and experienced another culture that helped improve her own understanding of life and the world.

B．书面表达

Dear__sir__or__madam，

I__read__the__newspaper__of__our__Students'__Center__and__I'm__glad__to__know__that__volunteers__are__needed.Now__I'm__writing__this__letter__to tell you that I'd like to be a volunteer to teach English in the after­school program.

Here are the reasons for my application.First, English is my favorite subject and I do well in teaching children, because I often teach my cousins English in summer vacations.Second, I'm outgoing and friendly.I know how to get along well with children.Moreover, I will come up with some interesting ways to help students to study easily and better.

I know it's not easy to be a volunteer，but I'm ready to try my best and face the challenges.

Looking__forward__to__your__reply.

Yours__sincerely，

Mia

六、A.回答问题

76．100 mothers show their daily timetable.

77．They spend 70 hours a week doing chores and looking after their families.

78．They spend about one hour and nine minutes cooking.

79．Mothers with children under 16 sleep less than six hours at night.

80．They are unhappy /not happy.

B．书面表达

Dear__Peter，

I__am__going__to have a birthday party for my mother at my house this Saturday afternoon.I need your help.When you come over to my house, could you please help me clean the living room? And what's more, could you please sweep the floor, clean the table and take out the rubbish? After that, could you go shopping with me to buy some drinks and snacks? I want to make a birthday cake for my mum, so please come to my house early that day.I'll be thankful for your help.

Looking forward to your reply soon.

Yours，

Dave

六、A.回答问题

76．All people/They meet mountains in their life.

77．She found a set of steps one day after school(while exploring the woods in the mountain).

78．Because she was curious./Because she wanted to know where the steps could lead to.

79．She ran back home.

80．She told nobody about what she found that night.

B．书面表达

How to Deal with the Trouble in Our Life

Nowadays, more and more students have too much trouble and are under great stress.

It is important for us to deal with the trouble properly.For example，if you argue with your friends, what should you do? In my opinion, you should call him or her to say sorry.Second, you can also invite him or her to see a film.What's more, you could write him or her a letter and tell him or her your feelings.I think your relationship will be better.And you will feel happy again.

All in all, it's necessary to find a good way to deal with our trouble.I hope my advice will be helpful.

The most unforgettable birthday party for me was my 10th birthday party.

It was such a happy day.At the party, my friends and I were singing and dancing.My mother was cooking for us.My father was talking with his friends.And my sister was playing the guitar for us.Besides, there was so much delicious food.We all liked it very much.What a wonderful birthday it was!

I hope I can have this kind of birthday party again in the future.

六、A.回答问题

76．They are from No.1 Middle School.

77．They should do warm­up activities before playing sports.

78．Amy Young talked about classroom safety.

79．Frank's/His school has an emergency response practice in September every year.

80．Three/3 students talked about school safety.

B．书面表达

How to Keep Ourselves Safe

Safety is very important to everyone, and students' safety is becoming the focus to us all.

To keep ourselves safe, first, we must follow the traffic rules when we go out.Second, we should eat healthy and safe food.Before we eat, make sure the food is clean and safe enough.Besides, it's dangerous to swim alone, so don't go to the river without permission.

In a word, it's important for us all to remember these to keep us away from danger.

六、A.回答问题

76．He was 52 (years old when he wrote The Old Man and the Sea).

77．They think he is unlucky/ he has bad luck.

78．He fights off some sharks successfully (in the story).

79．A boy named Manolin helps him (in the story).

80．Because he shows a lot of courage and perseverance.

B．书面表达

My favorite story is The Emperor's New Clothes.It is about a king who loved beautiful clothes very much.Because he wanted to get special clothes, two men cheated him.They said they could make the most beautiful clothes in the world.But finally when the emperor put on the new clothes, he could see nothing but only his underwear.Everyone said the clothes were great except a little boy.He told the truth and said the emperor was wearing nothing.

From this story, I learn that it is very important to be honest and not to tell lies.
